initializationAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/testformoney');
escapeAction: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Welcome to Lilycove Department Store! Here we have some crafted objects for your base!

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which items would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Which resource would you like to purchase?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: These items come in pairs of two. Would you like 2 Paintings for $300?

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=300..}] run give @s minecraft:painting 2');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=300..}] run playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup ambient @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Money=300..}] run scoreboard players remove @s Money 300');
q.dialogue.set_page('buyend');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');

lines: These items come in pairs of two. Would you like 2 Candles for $220?

pages.speaker: npc
lines: Lovely. And here you are. Happy decorating!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');
q.dialogue.close();
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:data/removemoneytags');
q.dialogue.close();
